name: RetroHomeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, ask my smart home to turn on”
”flip the light on”
”turn the other device off”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my smart home
des:
Who says you can't integrate the original home automation system with modern voice control? This skill integrates Alexa with the original "The Clapper(tm)" device. 

Just say, "Alexa, ask my smart home to turn on the light", and Alexa will take care of communicating with The Clapper(tm) for you, saving you the effort of clapping your own hands together. Great for hands-free operation! Turn on/off your lights while sipping a coffee, vaping, or petting your dog. 

This skill is not affiliated in any way with the makers of the awesome "The Clapper(tm)" device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
